types1:Item.types1:Name: iPaaS_Log_Search_DB
types1:Item.types1:Description: This Guide Provides Administrative and troubleshooting functions such as - search IPaaS ICAI Job logs - ability to find job related processes version: 1.6

avosScreenflow.name: iPaaS_Log_Search_DB
avosScreenflow.description: This Guide Provides Administrative and troubleshooting functions such as - search IPaaS ICAI Job logs - ability to find job related processes version: 1.6

screen.title: IPaaS Search Main page
screen.body:
Log Search

Select one of the options  below to Search for Integration Job Events and Job Logs

Learn more about the Logging Framework

screen.title: Search Events Options
screen.body:
Search Integration Job Event

Search String:  

Options
Events between  and 
Finde Events with Search String in:  
Process Name Contains:  
Logging Level >=  
Limit result to:  rows

options.option: xpath current-date() cast as xs:dateTime - xs:dayTimeDuration('P1D')

screen.title: Events Listing
screen.body:
Events Listing

Lmit Display to  Items  

 

Query:

screen.title: Search Jobs Form
screen.body:
SEARCH:

Using Id   

by other Search Criteria
Job Process ID  
Job or Process Name Contains  
Job Started Between  and   
Environment Contains  
Job Status  
Limit Results

screen.title: Job Logs
screen.body:
Job List 

  

Query: (Limit: )

operation.expression:
let $status_cond := switch ($temp.tmp_search_logging_level) case "Running" return <condition>STATUS = '1'</condition> case "Failed" return <condition>STATUS = '2'</condition> case "Completed" return <condition>STATUS = '3'</condition> default return () let $query := <query> <condition>Id = '{$temp.tmp_search_id }'</condition> <condition>Name LIKE '%{$temp.tmp_search_job_name }%'</condition> <condition>ENVIRONMENT LIKE '%{$temp.tmp_search_job_environment }%'</condition> <condition>JOB_PROCESS_ID = '{$temp.tmp_search_job_pid}'</condition> <condition>START_DATE >= {$temp.tmp_search_job_start_from }</condition> <condition>START_DATE <= {$temp.tmp_search_job_start_to }</condition> {$status_cond} </query>
let $conditions := for $condition in $query/condition/text() where (:Filter conditions that had empty values:) not (contains($condition,"''")) and not(contains($condition,"%%")) return $condition
let $limit_part := if (empty($temp.tmp_search_job_limit )) then () else concat("LIMIT ",$temp.tmp_search_job_limit) let $order_by_part := '
 Order By START_DATE DESC 
'
return concat(string-join($conditions, "
 AND ")," ",$order_by_part,$limit_part)
